title: Zentron Crystal Collection Abalone Shell and Tripod Stand
features: Includes: 1 ablone shell and 1 wooden tripod stand

Abalone shell is natural and pulled from the ocean. These will all vary but look very similar to the one pictured. Each has spectacular coloration on the inside from the natural nacre. Please allow for the natural descripancies and remember yours in one of a kind.
Cobra tripod is made of wood and folds in and out
Part of the Zentron Crystal Collection a collection of top quality items
description: Abalone shell and Tripod stand set. This comes with one abalone shell and one 5" wooden tripod stand. Great kit for incense burning and smudging. No sage sticks included.
